txt.en:
'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert weaponsmith! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'You are about ready to learn to be an artisan weaponsmith, which is the next step along your path to mastery. To do this, though, you will need to prove your worth to the expert weaponsmith in Thorin's Hall.

'If you impress Tithrandi, he may allow you to use the superior forge to create powerful weapons from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'

'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert weaponsmith! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'You are about ready to learn to be an artisan weaponsmith, which is the next step along your path to mastery. To do this, though, you will need to prove your worth to the expert weaponsmith in Thorin's Hall.

'If you impress Tithrandi, he may allow you to use the superior forge to create powerful weapons from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'
Crafting: A Superior Forge

You have completed Tithrandi's task
'You should speak at once with Tithrandi.'

'I see that you have gained proficiency as an expert weaponsmith! That is excellent, [placeholder]. You are showing remarkable progress.

'You are about ready to learn to be an artisan weaponsmith, which is the next step along your path to mastery. To do this, though, you will need to prove your worth to me.

'If you impress me, I may allow you to use the superior forge to create powerful weapons from your artisan recipes. Not many have this honour!'

'Well done, [placeholder]! You are truly ready to begin your journey as an artisan weaponsmith and beyond. The superior forges can be found here, as well as in many high-level areas throughout Middle-earth. I look forward to hearing of your renown as a great weaponsmith!'
You have grown swiftly and steadily as a Weaponsmith and are now nearly ready to begin using more advanced facilities. The superior forge awaits!
